item.name: cm:Отозвать запрос номера
item.property: (user.currentUser().hasDynamicBusinessRole(doc.getNodeRef(), "BR_INITIATOR") OR (doc.type()=="lecm-contract:document" AND user.currentUser().hasBusinessRole("CONTRACT_CURATOR"))) and (doc.attr("lecm-document-aspects:reg-data-is-registered") == null or doc.attr("lecm-document-aspects:reg-data-is-registered") == false) and (@reservationWorkflowService.isReservationRunning(doc.getNodeRef())==true) and (doc.attr("lecm-reservation-aspects:isReserved") == null or doc.attr("lecm-reservation-aspects:isReserved") == false) and doc.attr("lecm-statemachine:status") != "Черновик" and doc.attr("lecm-statemachine:status") != "Удален"
